body_html:
SyncReplicaOptimizer has been unsupported for some time and now is officially deprecated. Many cases can now use MirroredStrategy or CollectiveAllReduceStrategy instead.
…

officially deprecated.

Many cases can now use MirroredStrategy or CollectiveAllReduceStrategy
instead.

body:
SyncReplicaOptimizer has been unsupported for some time and now is
officially deprecated.

Many cases can now use MirroredStrategy or CollectiveAllReduceStrategy
instead.



On Sun, Nov 11, 2018, 10:38 AM Alfred Sorten Wolf <notifications@github.com
wrote:

> accordingly.
